description:
Prowlarr is an indexer manager/proxy built on the popular *arr .net/reactjs base stack to integrate with your various PVR apps.

Prowlarr supports management of both Torrent Trackers and Usenet Indexers.
It integrates seamlessly with Lidarr, Mylar3, Radarr, Readarr, and Sonarr offering complete management of your indexers with no per app Indexer setup required.
Changes:
- Fixed: Listening on all IPv4 Addresses
- Fixed: (PassThePopcorn) Increase rate limit
- New: (AnimeBytes) Use error message from response
- Match single digits only in season number regex for AnimeBytes
- Suggest adding IP to RPC whitelist for on failed Transmission auth
- Check if backup folder is writable on backup
- Bump SonarCloud azure extension to 3.X
- Word boundary in season number regex for AnimeBytes
- Fixed: (AnimeBytes) Include year in release title for series with year in filenames
- Fixed privacy level for Nebulance's API key
- Bump version to 1.29.2
- Catch search engine related error messages for MyAnonaMouse
- Don't send session information to Sentry
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Add more links for info FlareSolverr and category 8000
- Fixed: (RuTracker) Update categories
- Update how to get cookies info for Cardigann
- Fixed: (Knaben) Update base url
- Bump version to 1.29.1
- Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 2.1.7
- Bump System.Text.Json to 6.0.10
- Bump MailKit to 4.8.0
- Fixed: (NorBits) Searching UTF-8 characters with full search disabled (#2305)
- Use message from error response for Gazelle indexers
- Upgrade typescript-eslint packages to 8.181.1
- Upgrade Font Awesome to 6.7.1
- Upgrade babel to 7.26.0
- Use error message from Redacted response
- Bump version to 1.29.0
